channel.title: Need assistance
channel.description:
Need help! ive added a symbol located on my client.java its a boolean added it in npchandler.java this is the symbol PMelee its for block meele in prayer. ive added some stuff to it that will make all npc meele attacks hit 0s when its on and i save close, i compile and get this error
[code]NPCHandler.java:1354: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PMelee location: class NPCHandler if (PMelee == true) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
lol i knew i would get that ive tried fixing it rely..... now i need help on makeing the npchandler find that symbol from the client plz help so my block from meele could work. ty

item.title: Need assistance
item.dc:creator: @barkingdogc barkingdogc
item.description:
@barkingdogc wrote:

it cant find the symbol meaning when it tells you what Pmelee means you have it above it so the server doesnt know what pmelee means. anser to your problem put it under were you state what pmelee means

Read full topic
